table.name: civicrm_uf_join
table.comment: User framework join table. This links various internal civicrm object with a profile. Initial use cases are the donation object and the user module

field.name: module
field.title: Profile Module
field.comment: Module which owns this uf_join instance, e.g. User Registration, CiviDonate, etc.

field.name: entity_table
field.title: Profile Entity Table
field.comment: Name of table where item being referenced is stored. Modules which only need a single collection of uf_join instances may choose not to populate entity_table and entity_id.

field.name: entity_id
field.title: Profile Entity ID
field.comment: Foreign key to the referenced item.

field.name: weight
field.title: Order
field.comment: Controls display order when multiple user framework groups are setup for concurrent display.

field.name: uf_group_id
field.title: Profile ID
field.comment: Which form does this field belong to.

field.name: module_data
field.title: Profile Use Data
field.comment: Json serialized array of data used by the ufjoin.module
